job_description: Data Analyst - job post Surya Systems San Francisco, CA • Temporarily remote $85 an hour -  Contract You must create an Indeed account before continuing to the company website to apply Apply on company site save-icon Job details Salary $85 an hour Job Type Contract Position: SR Data Analyst Location: San Francisco, CA Duration: Long Term Contract Remote Till Covid 19 • Data Analyst, with SQL, Tableau OR Looker, Python, Excel, Strong Stats background • Drive personalization, real-time decision-making, causal inference, and predictive analytics capabilities . • Conduct quantitative analysis of experimental, and textual data to generate insights and drive decision making (ANOVA, Regression, Chi-Sq, AB, pre-post etc..) • Working knowledge of SQL, Tableau, Hadoop, BigQuery, Presto, Vertica • Write well documented code that can be shared and used across teams, and can scale to be used in existing products Soft skills: • Ability to communicate findings clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences and to effectively collaborate within cross-functional teams • We follow agile framework and processes. Hence, cross-functional collaboration, communication skills and a focus on delivering a great user experience are a must • You have a sense of urgency, move quickly and ship things Bonus Points: • Experience in Data Analyst and analytics • You're experienced in metrics and experiment-driven development • PhD or MS in computer science, machine learning, or statistics • Interesting side projects or Kaggle competition results Education Minimum Bachelor's Degree Thanks & Regards ... G Naveen Kumar Surya Systems, Inc 120 E Uwchlan Avenue Suite 203 Exton, PA 19341 Email : GavvalaN@suryasys.com Desk : 215-344-2345

Email Marketing Data Analyst - job post Xcel Agency 2261 Market St, San Francisco, CA 94114 Contract You must create an Indeed account before continuing to the company website to apply Apply on company site save-icon Job details Job Type Contract Company Description Xcel Agency is a leading digital marketing agency that specializes in helping global brands of all sizes increase their online visibility and reach their target audience. We help evolve and transform your data into best-in-class customer journeys that allow you to deepen customer relationships and drive revenue. With a robust team of experienced marketers, Xcel Agency offers a wide range of services to help businesses grow, including email marketing automation, social media marketing, search engine optimization, digital media services, and more. Our email marketing automation services help businesses create personalized and targeted campaigns that engage and convert customers, while its digital media services, including PPC advertising and social media advertising, drive targeted traffic to websites and generate leads and sales. With a focus on innovation, creativity, and results, Xcel Agency is the go-to partner for businesses looking to enhance their digital presence and drive growth. Job Description We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced data analyst to join our email marketing team. As an email marketing data analyst, you will be responsible for analyzing, interpreting, and making actionable insights from email campaign data to optimize email marketing strategy and drive business growth. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement data-driven solutions to improve customer engagement, increase conversions, and enhance overall customer experience. What you’ll be doing: Develop and maintain data models and algorithms to drive insights into email campaign performance and customer behavior. Analyze email marketing data to identify patterns, trends, and opportunities to optimize email campaigns and increase customer engagement and conversions. Develop and implement testing plans for email campaigns, including A/B testing, to optimize campaign performance and drive continuous improvement. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, product, and engineering, to develop and implement data-driven solutions to improve email campaign performance and customer experience. Provide regular reports and dashboards to communicate campaign performance and insights to key stakeholders. Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in email marketing, data analysis, and machine learning techniques to drive innovation and continuous improvement. Qualifications What we’re looking for: Agency experience preferred working with enterprise clients. Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field. Master's or Ph.D. preferred. Minimum of 3 years of experience in data analysis and modeling, with a focus on email marketing. Strong analytical skills and experience with data modeling, segmentation, and predictive analytics. Proficient in data analysis tools such as SQL, R, or Python. Experience with marketing automation tools such as Marketo, Eloqua, or Salesforce Marketing Cloud. Experience with A/B testing, experimental design, and statistical analysis. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to clearly communicate complex data insights to non-technical stakeholders. Additional Information If you are a highly analytical and data-driven individual with a passion for email marketing and customer engagement, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity! We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other legally protected status. We strive to create a workplace that reflects the communities we serve and welcome individuals from all backgrounds to apply. This is a remote, contract position. Must reside in the United States.
